channel.title: New MiniGame
channel.description:
[center]This is a new mini-game I am creating for my server.
Upon login you are opted to pick a side (as shown in this picture: http://puu.sh/3jTnm.jpg).
Once you picked a team you will notice that with you next login a counter will display (as shown in this picture: http://puu.sh/3jTpt.jpg)
Saradomin, Zamorak, and Guthix Warrior changes with what the player picked at the beginning. You get these points by killing other God's minions (other than your God's) for instance if you chose Zamorak you would get points for killing either Guthix or Saradomin minions. You get the idea. :)
Now also upon login (depending on your team) a new shop NPC is spawned -
Zamorak -
[img]http://puu.sh/3jTt1.jpg[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/3jTtN.jpg[/img]
Saradomin -
[img]http://puu.sh/3jTuW.jpg[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/3jTvm.jpg[/img]
Guthix (notice for Guthix I had to make an exception as there is no Godsword or other Guthix weapon) -
[img]http://puu.sh/3jTvZ.jpg[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/3jTwy.jpg[/img]
Now all these items can be purchased with the points from above but to get the points the players must kill the new God Minions.
[img]http://puu.sh/3jTzy.jpg[/img]
The new combat level helps the NPC's hit much higher making it harder but rewarding to get the points needed to obtain the items in the shop.
[img]http://puu.sh/3jTA6.jpg[/img]
Let me know what you guys think.[/center]

item.description:

Your teenage familiars can help “co-fight” with you or something.
[/quote]
You, sir, need help.[/quote]“help” is how this happened

item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

I would suggest beefing up Zammy and Bandos Godswords. They’re completely inferior compared to the SGS.

Read full topic

item.title: New MiniGame
item.dc:creator: @MicroZoft MicroZoft
item.description:
@MicroZoft wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:8, topic:522270”][quote author=MicroZoft link=topic=640772.msg4317986#msg4317986 date=1371793750]

bandos in the guthix shop

makes sense

yeah, but that doesnt explain why bandos is in there.

As far as I know there is no Guthix god in the GWD.
[/quote][/quote]

Because Zamorak and Saradomin both have their own, and as Armadyl is the strongest, I didn’t want to include that in the shop. Therefore I put Bandos as the Godsword available in their shop.

Read full topic

item.title: New MiniGame
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

Loveandpower:

Looks interesting it’s like a mage bank/castle wars combination

Feels more like Soulwars to me, with the killing of minions and getting points (Shards) to trade in for your team. It looks like a cool way to bring in some otherwise luck based or boss based items without just handing them out.

Read full topic

item.title: New MiniGame
item.dc:creator: @MicroZoft MicroZoft
item.description:
@MicroZoft wrote:

[center]This is a new mini-game I am creating for my server.

Upon login you are opted to pick a side (as shown in this picture: http://puu.sh/3jTnm.jpg).

Once you picked a team you will notice that with you next login a counter will display (as shown in this picture: http://puu.sh/3jTpt.jpg)

Saradomin, Zamorak, and Guthix Warrior changes with what the player picked at the beginning. You get these points by killing other God’s minions (other than your God’s) for instance if you chose Zamorak you would get points for killing either Guthix or Saradomin minions. You get the idea.

Now also upon login (depending on your team) a new shop NPC is spawned -

Zamorak -

Saradomin -

Guthix (notice for Guthix I had to make an exception as there is no Godsword or other Guthix weapon) -

Now all these items can be purchased with the points from above but to get the points the players must kill the new God Minions.

The new combat level helps the NPC’s hit much higher making it harder but rewarding to get the points needed to obtain the items in the shop.

Let me know what you guys think.[/center]
